name: Total Miner Forums: Original Awards Replacer
description:
This will bring back the old forum awards that some of us would like to use again.

Seriously, don't just copy this and claim it as your own. That's a dick move.
additional_info:
If you don't want custom cursors, just put in some random letters or numbers instead of a link.

V.1.0.0 (Release as of 12/7/15)
-Replaced Awards to classic look
-Replaced /gk and /invader emotes to more detailed versions
-Changed GK's profile name to a gold color
-Changed RF's profile name to a royal purple color
-Set to only work on the Total Miner Forums

V.1.0.0.1
-Changed Muffin Man's profile name to an orange color

V.1.0.1
Updated all the primary award replacing code to fix any errors there were (Should prevent the awards from appearing in post titles)

V.1.0.2
-Changed /db emote to a doge face

V1.0.2.1
-Fixed /db emote to not take up so much space.

V1.0.2.2
-Changed :8 emote to a rare pepe

V1.0.3
-Added an option to change any user's color (Only one person may be changed at a time)
-Now highlighting things will be green, instead of the default blue

V1.0.4
-You can now set custom Cursors

V1.0.5
-Updated the "Devil, Angel, and Cop" emotes to fit the pre-existing default emote theme

V1.0.6
-Updated the "Sage" emote to a new look

V1.0.7
-Updated the "^-^" emote to the Feels Good Man meme.

V1.0.8
-Added a new design for the new 3 Year award

V1.0.9
-Added a new design for the new Donor award

V1.0.10
-Minor adjustment to the award box to remove the open space
